changes.change:
Minor update for BSE Fixed dock alignment Icons that were added:
• Among Us
• Bundley
• Saily
Added SnowBoard UI and Dock Extension as dependencies

I have bumped up the version to 0.2 and removed it from beta,
since I have added a lot of new stuff to this theme, including a dock and settings icons.
Thank you to those who have downloaded this theme, and love it. It is an honor to
be making something that people love, so thank you. I'll be keeping BSE
free and open-source (you can get the project through my GitHub repo down below).

Here are the new stuff loaded in this theme!
• Settings icons for stock iOS, Accessibility and Shuffle
• A dock based on Big Sur's light mode dock

Icons that were changed:
• Wallet
• Filza

Icons that were added:
• Videos (for earlier versions of iOS)
Added Big Sur from alt03b1, Filza and SnowBoard SettingsIcons Extension as dependencies

Starting with this release, all stock apps that have a macOS icon
counterpart will use the macOS icon from
Big Sur by alt03b1 except for the following apps:
• Keynote
• Pages
• Numbers
• GarageBand
• iMovie
• Photo Booth

Icons that have been removed:
• App Store
• Books
• Calculator
• Calendar
• Contacts
• Find My

Added preference icons for Safari, Mail and General. Needs SnowBoard SettingsIcons Extension.

This beta release contains 85 icons, all created by me in Sketch 70.
